keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $18,064,741.78 on October 1, 2017.
Two significant fund transfers totaling $6,000,000.00 occurred during October 2017.
An interest payment of $10,641.18 was credited to the account on October 31, 2017.
The document includes contact information for inquiries regarding the account.
Cynthia Rodriguez is identified as a representative for personal assistance related to the account.
